articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Construction Site in Pyongyang International Airport
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Construction Site in Pyongyang International Airport
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence  Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the construction site of Terminal 2 of Pyongyang International Airport nearing completion.
					 Feasting his eyes on the terminal, he expressed satisfaction over its construction, saying the white tiger symbolic of the brave Korean nation depicted on its outer wall brings to the spotlight the national identity and helps appreciate it is the terminal of Korea, though it is a modern structure.
					
					 He went round the departure hall, waiting lounge, arrival hall and basement parking lot and others to learn in detail about their construction.
					
					 Recalling that he had given an instruction to properly set the proportion of spaces in the construction of the departure hall and waiting lounge in such a way as to ensure that they provide convenience to passengers and guests and stand impeccable not only in architectural beauty but in formative art, he praised the builders for making a rational use of spaces in constructing the hall and the lounge to suit their use.
					
					 As the construction of the terminal is nearing its completion, it is necessary to successfully complete the last phase of its interior decoration, he said.
					
					 Stressing the need to distribute various service networks in a harmonious and peculiar manner, he called for arranging more service facilities in the spaces between the departure hall and the arrival hall to provide the best convenience to passengers.
					
					 He called for ensuring artistry, visual quality and cultural level in designing the logo of the airport, signboards of service networks and posters.
					
					 He noted that the building of the terminal is impeccably splendid and it would be possible to successfully complete the project when builders correct some defects in interior construction with conviction.
					
					 It is important to complete the construction as scheduled but what is more important is to wind up the project in such a manner as to show the proud appearance of the socialist system in the DPRK and the standard of the highly civilized nation as befitting the gate to Pyongyang, he stressed.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and belief that the soldier-builders would perfectly build the terminal as a monumental edifice in the era of Songun.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Yang Gon, Ri Jae Il, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Yo Jong and Kim Nung O.

articles.title: KPA Service Personnel Meet to Pledge Loyalty
articles.content:
KPA Service Personnel Meet to Pledge Loyalty
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of service personnel of the ground, navy, air and anti-air force and strategic force of the Korean People's Army took place at the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Sunday to express profound homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and pledge loyalty to Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the birth anniversary of the President.
					 Present there were Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil and other commanding officers of the KPA, men and officers of its ground, navy, air and anti-air force and strategic force and cadets of military academies at all levels.
					
					 There took place a ceremonial play of the KPA Military Band.
					
					 All the participants expressed respects looking up to the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A 21-gun salute was boomed.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, made a speech.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea, Songun idea, brilliantly embodied them and thus built a dignified socialist power. He built the People's Army into a match-for-a hundred powerful revolutionary army, thus providing a solid foundation for the sovereignty of the country and the prosperity of the nation for all ages.
					
					 Kim Jong Il brought about successive victories in the unprecedented struggle for defending socialism with his energetic Songun revolutionary leadership, thereby performing the gigantic feats of making sure that the country ranked itself among the full-fledged nuclear weapons states and the world-level military powers.
					
					 The speaker referred to the faith and will of all service personnel to accomplish with arms the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 All the participants chanted slogans, reflecting their will to hold more tightly the arms of the revolution given to them by the great Generalissimos and accomplish without fail the great cause of Mt. Paektu under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There was a march-past by service personnel of the ground, navy, air and anti-air force and strategic force of the KPA and cadets of military academies at all levels and students of revolutionary schools.

articles.title: Delegation of Koreans in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of Koreans in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Koreans in Japan headed by Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Koreans Residents in Japan, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung. It came to Pyongyang to celebrate the Day of the Sun (his birth anniversary).
					 Members of the delegation laid bouquets before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, grandparents of Kim Il Sung, and the graves of Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, his parents, and paid silent tribute to them.
					
					 They visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum. At his old home in Mangyongdae, they recollected noble careers of Kim Il Sung and his patriotic and revolutionary family members in Mangyongdae.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize, Kim Il Sung Children Honor Prize Awarded to Exemplary Youth and Children
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize, Kim Il Sung Children Honor Prize Awarded to Exemplary Youth and Children
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize and Kim Il Sung Children Honor Prize were awarded to exemplary primary committees of the youth league and its officials and members, and members of the children's union on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the hall of the youth league on Sunday.
					
					 Decrees of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly were read out and Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize was conferred on eight primary committees of the youth league and its 26 officials and members who waged a dynamic struggle to defend and glorify Kim Il Sung's and leader Kim Jong Il's idea of the youth movement and leadership feats and performed feats in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Kim Il Sung Children Honor Prize went to 98 members of the children's union who set an example in the work to firmly prepare themselves to be juvenile revolutionaries and children's guards in the era of Songun devotedly defending the Workers' Party of Korea by learning from the glorious juvenile days of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Marathon Race Held
articles.content:
Marathon Race Held
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A marathon race took place with due ceremony at the Kim Il Sung Stadium on Sunday to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 It brought together more than 800 men and women marathoners.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, members of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission and officials concerned.
					
					 Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Kim Yong Hun declared an opening of the race, expressing belief that it would be held with success thanks to the minds and efforts of the participants.
					
					 Marathoners ran along streets, welcomed by working people, school youth and children.
					
					 Ri Yong Ho (man) and Kim Hye Song (woman) placed first, Ra Hyon Ho (man) and Kim Kum Ok (woman), Ri Kang Bom (man) and Sin Yong Sun (woman) second and third.
					
					 A closing ceremony took place.
					
					 Marathoners who proved successful at the race were awarded trophy cups and medals.
					
					 Meanwhile, a race of marathon fans took place on the same occasion.
					
					 Attending the race were more than 600 marathon fans from dozens of countries including Malaysia, Singapore, Sweden, Finland, UK and Italy. 
					
					 Certificates of participation and souvenirs were warded to marathon fans who proved successful at the marathon, half-marathon and 10 km race.

articles.title: Premieres of 4th April Spring People's Art Festival Given
articles.content:
Premieres of 4th April Spring People's Art Festival Given
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Premieres of the 4th April Spring People's Art Festival were given at the theaters, music halls and halls in Pyongyang on Sunday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Artists of the provincial art troupes, art squads, itinerant art squads and art groups sang high praises of the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Il Sung with high degree of ideological artistry and through dynamic music depiction.
					
					 Artistes of the art troupes of South Phyongan, South and North Hwanghae, Kangwon and North Hamgyong provinces and Kaesong City gave a performance at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre in praise of the great persons.
					
					 An art performance was given by the art troupes of North Phyongan, Jagang, South Hamgyong and Ryanggang provinces and Nampho City at the Ponghwa Art Theatre.
					
					 The art troupes of North Hwanghae and Kangwon provinces gave a drama at the National Theatre.
					
					 An art performance was given by the art squads of South and North Phyongan, South Hwanghae and South Hamgyong provinces, Kaesong and Rason cities and the Capital City Construction Commission, the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the C.C. of the Union of Agricultural Workers at the Central Youth Hall.
					
					 A performance of itinerant art squads was given at the Yun I Sang Concert Hall and that of art groups of working people from across the country at the People's Palace of Culture and the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre. 
					
					 The performances were acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 Members of the festival organizing committee, working people, youth and students in the city enjoyed performances.
					
					 The performances go on.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
 Nampho, April 12 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen met at Nampho Port on Sunday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the mosaics depicting smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Nampho City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Prior to the meeting they went round photos documenting the revolutionary careers of the President and Kim Jong Il and revolutionary exploits of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present there were the captains and crewmen of the Thailand-flagged ship Nordana Sophie and the Panama-flagged ship Sheng Yun Lai.
					
					 Speakers said at the meeting that the President led the two revolutionary wars to shining victory and built a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence on this land.
					
					 The President is always alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but the world progressives as he performed feats for the country and its people, the times and history under the unfurled banner of Juche, the speakers noted.
					
					 They expressed belief that the Korean people would build a thriving socialist nation and reunify the country at an early date under the leadership of respected HE Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of the President.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Spring Tree Planting Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Spring Tree Planting Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Tree planting in spring is progressing apace across the country.
					 Officials and working people across the country turned out in the campaign for tree planting in spring this year and thus planted more than 200 millions of trees for over 40 days.
					
					 The headquarters of the forest restoration campaign in Pyongyang and local areas, officials of the party and power bodies and those in the field of land and environmental protection conducted a vigorous tree planting in mountains and fields.
					
					 Mangyongdae, Hyongjesan and Sunan districts and Kangdong and Kangnam counties in Pyongyang fully secured saplings before planting them to suit to regional characters.
					
					 Officials and other people in the city planted more than 4 million high trees and flower shrubs.
					
					 Those in North Hwanghae Province planted over 30 million trees in over 6,000 hectares of areas.
					
					 Those in South Phyongan Province successfully conducted preparations for tree planting in conformity with the right time and thus achieved many successes in the spring tree planting.
					
					 Those in Chollima and Kangso districts in Nampho City planted trees to meet technical rules.
					
					 Those in Onchon and Ryonggang counties planted trees to form mixed forests.
					
					 Those in Jagang Province planted more than 1.8 million trees to form timber forest.
					
					 Those in North Hamgyong Province planted more than 10 millions trees of good species during the recent 10 days.
					
					 Those in North Phyongan, Kangwon, South Hamgyong and other provinces displayed patriotism in the tree planting.

articles.title: Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China Here
articles.content:
Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China Here
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China headed by Vice-Chairman Cha Sang Bo arrived here on Sunday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
ribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Ratna Sari Dewi Sukarno, director of the Dewi Sukarno Office in Japan who doubles as honorary chairperson of the Society for Disseminating and Supporting Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia, and her party and foreign guests visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday.
					 They paid high tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In the halls of immortality where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, they made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the hall where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 They made an entry in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses U.S. Crimes of Helping Japan Step up Militarization
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses U.S. Crimes of Helping Japan Step up Militarization
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article discloses the crimes the U.S. perpetrated by inciting Japan to militarization. Revealing their danger, the article of the paper continues:
					 The same situation as the one on the eve of the World War I in the 1910s and the Cuban missile crisis in the 1960s, which were recorded as the most critical situation in the 20th century, has been again created in Northeast Asia in the 2010s. This is a very serious development of situation. 
					
					 For the past decades, the U.S. has shipped a lot of nuclear weapons to south Korea and got zealous in rearming Japan, a defeated country, in a bid to ignite the second Korean war in Northeast Asia. Now Japan has been emboldened by the U.S. to work hard to organize even ICBM forces.
					
					 The historical foundation that incited Japan to militarization was created by the U.S. which provoked the Korean war that helped the former achieve the "high-rate growth" of its economy.
					
					 Now Japan is rushing headlong into militarism on the basis of the foundation laid by the U.S.
					
					 At present the U.S. seeks to realize its wild ambition for dominating the world, forcing Japan to bear the burden of huge military expenditure for carrying out its pivot-to-Asia-Pacific strategy.
					
					 This is no more than a reckless criminal act to further incite Japan to militarization.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' wild dream for reviving the erstwhile empire can never come true.
					
					 They should drop such a wild ambition and make a bold decision to redeem its crime-woven past this year that marks the 70th anniversary of Japan's defeat.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Plan Air-Strike Exercise against DPRK
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Plan Air-Strike Exercise against DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet air force announced that it would kick off a joint air-strike drill Max Thunder in the sky across south Korea from April 10 to 24 together with the U.S. air force, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 More than 100 huge air-strike means, including F-16 fighter bombers, F-15K, KF-16 and F-4E fighters, C-130 transport plane and E-737 AWACS of the U.S. imperialist aggressors and the south Korean puppet forces, will be involved in the war drills aimed at the preemptive attack on the DPRK from the air.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Blocking Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Blocking Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Paek Ki Wan, director of the Unification Study Center, Rev. Ham Se Ung and representatives of civic and public organizations of south Korea and other elders and bereaved families of the ferry Sewol disaster held a press conference in Seoul on April 7 to denounce the puppet authorities for blocking the probe into truth about the disaster.
					 At the press conference speakers accused the "government" of trying to institute "enforcement ordinance" related to the special law as a law.
					
					 They said they would launch an all-people movement such as a signature campaign and hunger strike to have the "enforcement ordinance" abolished and salvage the ferry.
					
					 They expressed the will to struggle against the present regime and defend human rights.

articles.title: U.S. Deploys Nuclear War Means around Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
U.S. Deploys Nuclear War Means around Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Munhwa Ilbo on April 8 exposed the fact that the U.S. latest nuclear war means are being deployed in the Asia-Pacific.
					 According to it, the U.S. is making rotation deployment of several latest Virginia-class nuclear submarines into the U.S. Seventh Fleet carrying out the operation duty in the Asia-Pacific.
					
					 The U.S. remodeled at least 60 Aegis destroyers to be used for missile defense system, made them equipped with SM-3 missiles and two of them belong to the U.S. Seventh Fleet in order to deploy them around the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is also making a rotation deployment of B-2 and B-52 nuclear strategic bombers based on the U.S. mainland into the Anderson air force base on Guam.
					
					 The U.S. latest preemptive nuclear strike means are being deployed on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Government Employees Declare General Strike
articles.content:
S. Korean Government Employees Declare General Strike
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- South Korean government employees' actions are mounting higher to denounce the puppet authorities' moves to retrogressively reform the pension for government employees.
					 The Government Employees' Union on April 7 declared they would launch a general strike against the retrogressive reform of the pension for government employees.
					
					  The union planned to set up voting stations in its branches on April 6 and conduct voting in order to stage a general strike against the misrule of the puppet authorities. But the puppet ruling forces blocked voting stations by hurling police.
					
					 The General Federation of Trade Unions of Government Employees on April 8 declared that if the authorities retrogressively revise the pension for government employees, it would stage a general strike.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities Accused of Suppressing Chongryon
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities Accused of Suppressing Chongryon
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Japanese organizations released statements on Mar. 31 and Apr. 1 in protest against the brigandish action recently taken by the authorities against the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange noted:
					
					 The police task force under the joint investigation headquarters involving policemen of Kyoto, Kanagawa, Yamaguchi and Shimane prefectures perpetrated such violence as searching the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee.
					
					 The violence is an unprecedented atrocious action that violated not only the constitution and criminal procedure code but international law.
					
					 Chongryon is a legitimate overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK that protects the democratic national rights of Koreans in Japan and plays the role of a diplomatic mission of the DPRK in Japan in the absence of diplomatic relations between the two countries.
					
					 Suppression of Chongryon should never be tolerated.
					
					 We vehemently denounce the action taken against Chongryon and bitterly protest the government against the violence.
					
					 We urge the police authorities to make an immediate apology for it.
					
					 The National Association for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Diplomatic Relations noted:
					
					 We hardly repress our anger at the atrocious action taken by the police authorities.
					
					 The action is politically-motivated suppression of Chongryon and an act hostile to the DPRK.
					
					 The regime should honestly reflect on the case.

articles.title: Film Show in China Marks Day of Sun
articles.content:
Film Show in China Marks Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A film show took place at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Apr. 9 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Present there were families of Korean anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters in China, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs and Chinese related to anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, the ambassador and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Beijing.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before paying profound homage to them.
					
					 Then they watched a Korean film "Masikryong Ski Resort."
					
					 At the end of the film show they looked round photos documenting the undying exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on British Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on British Website
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The full text of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was jointly posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on an internet homepage on April 6.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the revolutionary cause in the DPRK to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 It indicates tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Posted on Austrian Website
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Posted on Austrian Website
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was posted by the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK on its website on April 6. 
					 A portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung was also posted there.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Foreign media gave wide publicity to the life of President Kim Il Sung on his birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun). 
					 Myanmar paper The New Age on Mar. 31 carried an article titled "The Eternal Sun" with a portrait of smiling President. 
					
					 The progressive mankind as well as the Korean people are splendidly celebrating the Day of the Sun every year, the paper noted, and went on:
					
					 The President beat back the U.S. and Japanese imperialist powers and turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence under the banner of Juche.
					
					 He regarded it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven and devoted his all to them. 
					
					 Under his leadership free medical care, free education system and other popular policies have been enforced in the DPRK, turning the country into a harmonious whole where all people help and lead each other forward. 
					
					 His great personalities and kind-heartedness touched the people.
					
					 Though he passed away, his idea and cause will shine forever as the sun does.
					
					 An Indian paper on Mar. 26 carried an article introducing the sincere aid he rendered to many countries and nations for their struggle for achieving national liberation against the imperialists and for building new society.
					
					 The website of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany in an article titled "Banner of Independence Brightens the Way ahead of Humankind" praised the ideological and theoretical feats leader Kim Jong Il performed by enriching the Juche idea founded by the President to be guidelines for the cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Brazilian Personage
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Brazilian Personage
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Acilino Riveiro, national coordinator of the Genuine Democratic Movement of Brazil, made public a statement on April 7 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The President is praised by the progressive as the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 He founded the Juche idea to provide a great guiding idea for the cause of independence.
					
					 The foundation of the Juche idea helped usher in the new era of history, the era of independence in which the popular masses hew out the road of the times and revolution independently and creatively as the masters of the world and their own destiny.
					
					 He led the cause of independence to victory with his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 He ushered in the new era of the development of international relations based on independence.
					
					 He also actively supported the people of many countries in their struggle for achieving anti-imperialist national liberation and building new society.
					
					 He always lives in the heart of all people as the sun of Juche as he opened the era of independence and dedicated his whole life to the triumphant advance of the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Revolutionary Cause of Songun Is Sure to Win: British Bodies
articles.content:
Revolutionary Cause of Songun Is Sure to Win: British Bodies
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea posted a special write-up on a website on Apr. 4 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The special write-up illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Un standing on the tribune of honor of Kim Il Sung Square noted:
					
					 It is an expression of boundless respect of the Workers' Party of Korea and all the Korean people for Kim Jong Un and deep trust reposed by them in him that they hold him in high esteem at the top posts of the party, state and army.
					
					 As was seen in the films showing him giving field guidance to various fields of national economy of the DPRK and units of the Korean People's Army, he is the most popular leader.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are dynamically advancing toward the final victory, united close around him.
					
					 He has wisely led the WPK, the KPA and the Korean people for the past three years.
					
					 He has successfully steered the drive of the entire party, the whole army and all the people for translating into reality all what President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il desired during their lifetime.
					
					 The Korean people will invariably advance along the road of independence and Songun taken by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il all their lives, and the revolutionary cause of Songun in the DPRK is sure to win.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Indonesia
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A seminar was sponsored by an Indonesian company and film shows by other Indonesian companies on Apr. 1 and 2 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Films shown included Korean film "Pyongyang Today."

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on German Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on German Website
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Kimilsungia Is an Immortal Flower Blooming in the Hearts of Humankind in the Era of Independence" was posted by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on its internet homepage on April 7.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 94 (2005), deals with the historical position of Kimilsungia, significance of its cultivation and tasks for bringing the flower of the sun into full bloom everywhere in Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el campo de construccion de la segunda terminal del Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang en etapa final.
					Contemplando la terminal, el Mariscal dijo que gracias a la descripcion del Paekho (tigre blanco), que simboliza la nacion coreana valiente e intrepida, en la pared exterior del edificio, la terminal da destaque a la nacionalidad armonizandose con la edificacion contemporanea. Agrego con satisfaccion que esa descripcion da a conocer que el edificio es la terminal aerea de nuestro pais.
					
					Pasando revista a varios puntos inclusive los halles de salida, espera y llegada y el parqueo subterraneo, estudio en detalles el estado de construccion.
					
					Recordo que el mismo instruyo hacer bien la definicion de proporcion de espacio de halles de salida y llegada para ofrecer la comodidad a los pasajeros y los huespedes y asegurar la belleza arquitectonica y arte figurativo.
					
					Anadio que se llevo de modo racional la conformacion de hall segun la utilidad de halles.
					
					Asevero que deben hacer bien la obra de acabado del interior en la etapa final.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de instalar armoniosamente y de modo singular las redes de servicio de diferentes clases. Dio destaque al tema de ubicar mas las redes de servicio en los espacios de halles de salida y llegada para asegurar al maximo la comodidad de los pasajeros.
					
					Enseno crear bien el emblema del aeropuerto, los carteles y materiales de propaganda de las redes de servicio asegurando los caracteres artisticos, visuales y culturales.
					
					Es majestuoso el edificio de la terminal, recalco y prosiguio que es posible culminarlo perfectamente si se rectifican algunos puntos defectivos surgidos en la obra interior.
					
					Es importante observar el tiempo definido en la construccion de la terminal, asevero y continuo que lo mas significativo es perfeccionarla como digna puerta de Pyongyang para demostrar con intuicion el aspecto enorgullecedor del regimen socialista de nuestro pais e indice del pais civilizado.
					
					Manifesto su gran esperanza de que los constructores militares levanten perfectamente la terminal como creacion monumental de la epoca del Songun.
					
					Le acompanaron Kim Yang Gon, Ri Jae Il, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Yo Jong y Kim Nung O.
